document_data.name: Oskler Mhandyvver
document_data.mainbody:
'''Oskler Mhandyvver''' was the proprietor of [[Mhandyvver's Poultry]] in [[Red Larch]] around 1366 DR; a poultry shop offering meat, eggs, and chicks.

Oskler hired younger boys in order to protect his poultry runs by killing predators such as [[fox]]es, [[hawk]]s, [[owl]]s, and [[weasel]]s.
